Panel research study for leading global healthcare company

To participate in this research panel successfully you are requested to allow your social media content to be analysed. Access is on-device only. None of your content leaves your device. Click here for more information.

To participate in this research panel successfully you are requested to allow your social media content to be analysed. Access is on-device only. None of your content leaves your device. Click here for more information.

To participate in this research panel successfully you are requested to allow your social media content to be analysed. Access is on-device only. None of your content leaves your device. Click here for more information.

To participate in this research panel successfully you are requested to share access to your social media content held in your digi.me account. Access is on-device only. None of your content leaves your device. Click here for more information
You will receive £50.00 in Amazon vouchers as a reward for participating successfully. Click here for more information.
The first 100 people to successfully participate will each receive a £50 Amazon voucher.

To participate in this study you will need to submit your email address in order to process your reward (£50,00 in Amazon vouchers for each individual who is eligible and successfully completes the survey. No participant can receive no more than one reward. reward is to be made available to the first 100 participants who completed the survey successfully. After which the survey will be withdrawn from the market). Your email address is strictly used for this purpose only and shall not be shared with any organisation, other than the research panel company for the purposes to process your reward.
To participate you need to confirm you can answer YES to all questions below
I can confirm I meet all of the following criteria and am therefore eligible to participate.

I am:
• UK based and English speaking person
• Mother of 3 to 12 months old child / children
• User of Facebook and/or Twitter
• User of an Android phone and / or tablet

Individuals associated with the running of the survey are excluded from participation. Strictly one remuneration voucher only is available per successful participant.
Don\'t forget to return to
Set up digi.me first!
Important information

To participate in this research panel successfully you will be requested to give access to your social media content stored within your digi.me account.

Your content will not leave your device nor be shared with any third party. Your content will be analysed automatically on your device and the outcomes of the analysis will be shared with REON Labs ehf. REON Labs ehf will only share the aggregation of anonymised findings of participants of the research study with their client, a leading global healthcare company.

Any findings shared with REON Labs ehf and their client shall be used for this specific research study only.
Proceed

You are done already! No further action required.

You may see this screen if you have already completed the sharing process. In which case there are no new sharing requests pending for you. Sit back, explore the digi.me app and wait for your reward voucher to be emailed to you.\n\nThank you for participating!
Congratulations!

Thank you for participating.
The permission you granted to analyse your Facebook and Twitter content in your digi.me library has been successful. The social media analysis has taken place and the answers only have been shared. None of your digi.me library’s actual content has been shared.

If you are one of the first 100 participants to complete successfully, then your £50 Amazon voucher will be sent to the email address provided within 5 business days. Please keep an eye on your inbox!

Thank you for participating successfully and remember that you can continue to enjoy your main digi.me application – it’s free!
Submit
Get it, See it\nThen Share it!

No data seems to be available. Have you set up your digi.me account successfully and connected (at least) your Facebook or Twitter account?

Open the digi.me app on your device, select a private location in the Cloud to store your personal library (like a folder location within a Dropbox or GoogleDrive account). Then connect your online accounts from social media, financial service providers, healthcare records, wearables, etc.

When you have completed setting up your digi.me account you can participate in this survey by consenting to share access to parts of your data for the purposes of this survey.
Open\ndigi.me
Get it, See it\nThen Share it!

You will need to get your data before you can share any of it. This you do by downloading your digi.me app, deciding where to store your private library and then connecting any sources of data you like (like Facebook and Twitter content).\n\nAfter you have set up your digi.me account, come back here and share access to your data in a secure way with this app.
Download\ndigi.me
Loading, please wait.
We take the security of your personal data very seriously.\nFor your protection we are validating your account and that of the party you have granted access to.
